mapper.select: WITH STO AS ( SELECT A.STO_NO, A.CONTENTS_CODE, A.CONTENTS_NO, A.MEMBER_ID, B.RES_NAME, C.RES_FILERENAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.STO_NO ORDER BY A.STO_NO DESC) AS STO_NUM FROM STORAGE_TBL A JOIN RESTAURANT_TBL B ON A.CONTENTS_NO = B.RES_NO JOIN RESIMG_TBL C ON A.CONTENTS_NO = C.RES_NO ORDER BY CONTENTS_CODE) SELECT * FROM STO WHERE STO_NUM = 1 AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CONTENTS_CODE ='restaurant'

WITH STO AS ( SELECT A.STO_NO, A.CONTENTS_CODE, A.CONTENTS_NO, A.MEMBER_ID, B.ROOM_NAME, C.ROOM_FILERENAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.STO_NO ORDER BY A.STO_NO DESC) AS STO_NUM FROM STORAGE_TBL A JOIN ROOM_TBL B ON A.CONTENTS_NO = B.ROOM_NO JOIN ROOMIMG_TBL C ON A.CONTENTS_NO = C.ROOM_NO ORDER BY CONTENTS_CODE) SELECT * FROM STO WHERE STO_NUM = 1 AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CONTENTS_CODE ='room'

WITH STO AS ( SELECT A.STO_NO, A.CONTENTS_CODE, A.CONTENTS_NO, A.MEMBER_ID, B.ATTR_NAME, C.ATTR_FILERENAME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.STO_NO ORDER BY A.STO_NO DESC) AS STO_NUM FROM STORAGE_TBL A JOIN ATTRACTION_TBL B ON A.CONTENTS_NO = B.ATTR_NO JOIN ATTRACTION_IMG C ON A.CONTENTS_NO = C.REF_ATTR_NO ORDER BY CONTENTS_CODE) SELECT * FROM STO WHERE STO_NUM = 1 AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CONTENTS_CODE ='attraction'
